channel.title: 单调栈 on WNCBB's blog
channel.description: Recent content in 单调栈 on WNCBB's blog

item.title: 0042.rapping-rain-water
item.description: | |*.*.*.*| | |*.*.*| | | |*.*| 0 1 2 3 4 先算最下层的* 再加倒数第二层 1func trap(height []int) int { 2 rst := 0 3 stack := make([]int, 0) 4 for i := 0; i < len(height); i++ { 5 for !stackIsEmpty(stack) && height[stackPeek(stack)] < height[i] { 6 // height = [3, 2, 1, 0] 7 // stack= index(value) 0(3) 1(2) 2(1) 3(0) height[i]=4 8 // 这个时候，处理对象是stack里的3(0)，3(0)的左边比他高的最近的是2，3(0)的右边比他高的最近的是i(4) 9 var curIdx int 10 stack, curIdx = stackPop(stack) 11 if !
